FuncDef: The display security weak-password-dictionary command displays the weak password configured on a device. The display security weak-password-dictionary command displays the weak password configured on a device.
ExtraInfo: A device supports the pre-configuration of a weak password dictionary. A user-configured password cannot be the same as any password in the weak password dictionary (completely match). To check the configured weak password, run the display security weak-password-dictionary command.
